name: Bundle : "Anchor" Tee + False Idols (EP) + Stickers
description:
Tee-Shirt :
Anchor Navy Unisex jersey t-shirt.
Printed on Gildan Softstyle. Model is wearing 'M' size.

EP - False Idols :
1. Prelude to a Tragedy
2. There's No I in Team
3. I'm Here to Break the Sky
4. Buried Dreams
5. You and Me Against the World
6. As an Unexpected Secret


+ FREE STICKERS

Shipping Informations: 
All orders are processed & shipped within 2-4 business days. Deliveries Monday to Friday only. Transit time in the European Union is approximately 5-10 business days depending on location. Rest of the World may take up to 20 business days to arrive. Please note that deliveries during sales, bank holidays, christmas, bad weather or unforeseen cataclysmic events may be slightly delayed. Any more questions? Please send an e-mail to - asaimlessglory@live.fr.


General Sizing Information
(width x height in inches)

X-Small - 16 x 25
Small - 17 x 26
Medium - 20 x 28
Large - 21 x 29
X-Large - 23 x 31
